definitions.definition: A common hydrous aluminosilicate mineral found in sediments , soils and sedimentary rocks , Al 2 Si 2 O 5 ( OH ) 4 ; one of the kaolin group of minerals.

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) A common hydrous aluminosilicate mineral found in sediments , soils and sedimentary rocks , Al 2 Si 2 O 5 ( OH ) 4 ; one of the kaolin group of minerals.
